Uses of Package
models

  • Packages that use models 
    Package Description
    controllers  
    models  
    utilities  
    views  
  • Classes in models used by controllers 
    Class Description
    Game_Model
    This is the main model class, it goes through phases of the game
    Map_Helper
    IO_Map_Helper Class is a model Handles the map initialization and map creation
    Map_Model
    Map Class is a model Map is a data class that maintains the game map structure
    State_Player_Strategy
    The ENUMERATED states for the as state of player strategy
  • Classes in models used by models 
    Class Description
    Attack_Model
    this class has the logic of a single attack from one territory to another
    Behaviour
    behavior interface for player methods
    Cards
    Cards Class is a model.
    Continent
    Continent Class is a model to store and present information about a continent of a map
    Fortify_Model
    fortify class specifying from and to territory
    Game_Model
    This is the main model class, it goes through phases of the game
    Map_Model
    Map Class is a model Map is a data class that maintains the game map structure
    Message_Handler
    this is a model class, which handles the string messages
    Player
    Player Class is a model Controls the actions of the player and retains the state of a given player throughout the game
    Player_Collection
    player collection class to implement all method related to the player
    Post_Attack_Model
    post attack model class to set 0 number of armies for player
    Reinforce_Model
    reinforce model class to set 0 as number of armies and to territory
    State
    enumeration of states inside an attack_Model
    State_Game
    The ENUMERATED states for the as state of game strategy
    State_Player
    States of a player during the game
    State_Player_Strategy
    The ENUMERATED states for the as state of player strategy
    Territory
    Territory Class is a model A data class maintaining the state of a given territory
